select table_name AS tableName, engine AS engine, table_comment AS tableComment, create_time AS createTime from information_schema.tables where table_schema = (select database())
and table_name like concat('%', #{tableName}, '%')
order by create_time desc

select table_name AS tableName, engine AS engine, table_comment AS tableComment, create_time AS createTime from information_schema.tables where table_schema = (select database()) and table_name = #{tableName}

select table_name AS tableName,column_name AS columnName, ordinal_position AS ordinalPosition, data_type AS dataType, column_comment AS columnComment, is_nullable AS isNullable,column_key AS columnKey, extra AS extra from information_schema.columns where table_name = #{tableName} and table_schema = (select database()) order by ordinal_position
